duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist the Package Dispatch Supervisor (PDS) with dispatch analysis and daily routine tasks
Verify system downloads and identify various service failures and exceptions
Print and distribute multiple daily reports and make necessary report updates
Utilize mapping tools and plot previous data to compare actual dispatch to planned dispatch
Maintain a loop analysis to ensure periodic analysis of all loops
Utilize available reports and systems and complete monthly dispatch audit

skills.skill: Dispatch Planning System (DPS) and UDC knowledge
Microsoft Office products or equivalent software
Customer-focused with strong planning and organization skills

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree or International equivalent in Logistics or a related field
